Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Relates to authorizing an exemption for class one capital improvements to residential buildings and certain new construction in a special assessing unit that is not a city
Summary: Authorizes an exemption for class one capital improvements to residential buildings and certain new construction in a special assessing unit that is not a city.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing an exemption for class one capital improvements to residential buildings and certain new construction in a special assessing unit that is not a city; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
